pr_title: ArC- reduce overhead of metadata initialization in subclass constructors

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't you use the LONG version?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Yes, of course.. I'll fix it.
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't you use the INT version?
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Is it normal it's String here?
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +13,22 @@
     static final FieldDescriptor QUALIFIERS_IP_QUALIFIERS = FieldDescriptor.of(Qualifiers.class, "IP_DEFAULT_QUALIFIERS",
             Set.class);
 
+    static final FieldDescriptor ANNOTATION_LITERALS_EMPTY_CLASS_ARRAY = FieldDescriptor.of(AnnotationLiterals.class,
+            "EMPTY_CLASS_ARRAY",
+            Class[].class);
+
+    static final FieldDescriptor ANNOTATION_LITERALS_EMPTY_STRING_ARRAY = FieldDescriptor.of(AnnotationLiterals.class,
+            "EMPTY_STRING_ARRAY",
+            String[].class);
+
+    static final FieldDescriptor ANNOTATION_LITERALS_EMPTY_LONG_ARRAY = FieldDescriptor.of(AnnotationLiterals.class,
+            "EMPTY_LONG_ARRAY",
+            String[].class);

replies.bodyText: Eh, of course not. I was just too tired...
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.author: gsmet

+    static final FieldDescriptor ANNOTATION_LITERALS_EMPTY_CLASS_ARRAY = FieldDescriptor.of(AnnotationLiterals.class,

timeline.bodyText: Just to be sure, you call that one often or not? If you do better move that one to the constructor as they look fully immutable.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: No. It's a consumer of the InvocationContext who can invoke this method inside the interceptor...
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.message:
ArC- reduce overhead of metadata initialization in subclass constructors

- use shared literal instances for interceptor bindings
- use shared interceptor chains

ArC- reduce overhead of metadata initialization in subclass constructors

- use shared literal instances for interceptor bindings
- use shared interceptor chains
SubclassGenerator - set the initialCapacity for the map of metadata
SubclassGenerator - set the initialCapacity for the map of metadata
